Statement and Memorandum of DPRK Foreign Ministry Supported in Denmark
articles.content:
Statement and Memorandum of DPRK Foreign Ministry Supported in Denmark 
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association in a statement on March 4 voiced full support to the Feb. 10 statement and the Mar. 2 memorandum of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
 The statement denounced the Bush administration for intensifying war moves and military exercises against the DPRK and manipulations to isolate and stifle it after branding it as part of "axis of evil" and "outpost of tyranny."    
 The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association pays attention to the fact that the situation of the Korean Peninsula is being carried into the extreme pitch of strain by the U.S. moves to provoke a new war, the statement said, strongly demanding that the U.S. stop its interference in the domestic issue of Korea and withdraw its forces and all its military equipment from south Korea.

articles.title: Treachery of Pro-U.S. Conservative Forces Denounced
articles.content:
Treachery of Pro-U.S. Conservative Forces Denounced 
    Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification on March 4 issued a statement titled "We condemn the pro-U.S. ultra-right conservative forces tarnishing the spirit of the March First Popular Uprising and resorting to acts against the nation and reunification".
 The statement called upon the youth and students to ostracize once and for good these forces standing in the way of the nation's reunification and greet a new motherland independent and reunified.    
 It denounced these forces for throwing a wet blanket over the heightened fervor of the people to make this year the year of independent reunification of the nation without fail, greeting the 86th anniversary of the popular uprising. 
 Recalling that the conservative forces on March 1 opened the so-called "People's Rally", at which they committed the criminal act of impairing the March first spirit and laying again a chill on the people's ardent desire for independent reunification, while chanting "pro-U.S. and anti-north slogan", the statement said: They are traitors to the nation and
anti-reunification forces which tail behind the U.S. and seek their own personal end, paying no heed to independence and reunification.    
 The true inheritance of the March first spirit is to wage an active practical fight to achieve an independent reunification under the uplifted banner of three forms of cooperation -- cooperation for national independence, cooperation for peace against war and cooperation for reunification and patriotism -- by pooling the efforts of the nation.
